title: riot handed me a mystery gift and then i got an error
body:
Hi,
just logged in to see that riot sent me a mystery gift. Before I could open it though i got an error and couldn't see what it was. 

Did riot really give everyone a gift? also if so, then how do i check what I got!?

replies.body: I looked into this for you, and it looks like you received a Bat-o-lantern icon and a Demacia Icon.  They should appear in your purchase history via the in-game store.  Not sure what error you may have received, but let me know if that clears thing sup!
